ship.name: Perfume Yuda
ship.description: A ship pulled by two Yuda (sea serpents)

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a red heart-shaped crown and nine snake-like appendages
jollyRoger.symbolism: Represents the Kuja tribe's connection to snakes and Hancock's beauty

affiliations.description: The Kuja Pirates are protected by Hancock's Warlord status
The crew represents the warrior women of Amazon Lily

keyMoments.title: Kuja Pirates Introduction
keyMoments.description: The Kuja Pirates are introduced as Hancock and her sisters meet with Vice-Admiral Momonga on their ship.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew as representatives of Amazon Lily and shows their connection to Hancock's Warlord status.

keyMoments.title: Defying the World Government
keyMoments.description: Hancock, representing the Kuja Pirates, refuses the World Government's summons to war, risking the crew's protected status.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's loyalty to Hancock's decisions even when they conflict with the World Government.

trivia: The Kuja Pirates are unique as they are an all-female pirate crew
Their ship is pulled by Yuda, giant sea serpents that can traverse the Calm Belt
The crew benefits from Hancock's Warlord status, which provides protection from Marine pursuit
